article: Most women like going shopping. But it is not  _  for a woman like me to go shopping. Why do I say so? Firstly, I have three children to look  _  .My husband doesn't even know how to  _  them. I think it's my fault .I always do all the things myself instead of teaching  _  .So I feel very  _  every day as a housewife. Maybe I think I feel even more tired than my husband. How can I find free time to  _  ? If I do, what should I do with my three children? The oldest of them is only six years old. Secondly, I am getting much fatter. So it's hard for me to  _  clothes that fit me well. Lastly, and I think it's the most  _  .We don't have enough  _  to buy pretty clothes. We have to raise so many children with the little money that my husband makes. Oh, how I regret that I am living such a  _  life because I have so many children.
